title: Black Saree Portrait
prompt: Turn this photo into 'Create a retro, vintage-inspired image grainy yet bright - based on the reference picture. The girl should be draped in a perfect black, Pinterest-style aesthetic retro saree. The vibe must capture the essence of a 90s movie brown-longhaired baddie, with wavy curls and a small flower tucked visibly into her hair, enhanced by a windy, romantic atmosphere. She stands against a solid wall, where deep shadows and dramatic contrasts add mystery and artistry to the scene, creating a moody yet enchanting cinematic effect.'

title: Moody Field Portrait
prompt: Create a cinematic, moody photograph of a young woman (based on uploaded image) standing in a lush green field of tall grass under a cloudy, overcast sky. She is wearing a creamy sleeveless crop top and low waist light blue baggy jeans. Her posture is expressive and dramatic, leaning slightly backward with one arm outstretched and palm open, as if embracing the wind at the moment.

title: Red Satin Saree Portrait
prompt: Create a soft, sunlit portrait of this face wearing a red satin silk saree. She is standing gracefully against a plain wall, bathed in warm natural light with red spot light artistic shadow. Her gentle expression, loose hair strands moving slightly, and the dreamy golden glow create a serene, poetic, and romantic vibe. She looks like a model standing in the middle.

title: Dreamy Floral Book Portrait
prompt: A dreamy and romantic portrait based on the reference picture: standing amidst blooming white flowers on a spring day. She is holding an open book close to her face, smiling peacefully, as if enjoying the fragrance of nature and the comfort of reading. She has medium-length hair styled naturally and wears a pastel-colored knee-length dress with flowers. The golden sunlight filtering through blossoms casts a warm glow.

title: Meadow Sitting Portrait
prompt: Create a serene and dreamy outdoor portrait of a young woman sitting in tall grass at the edge of a meadow with misty green hills in the background. She is wearing a light-colored knee-length floral dress styled like a summer dress, giving a soft and romantic vibe. Leaning back with one arm behind her for support, head tilted slightly back in a relaxed pose, her expression is dreamy and romanticising the environment.

title: Subway Station Aesthetic
prompt: A candid aesthetic photo of a young woman at a metro/subway station, smiling naturally while wearing casual chic clothes — a floral tank top, high-waisted jeans, and a tote bag. Soft cinematic lighting, warm tones, Pinterest-style, lifestyle aesthetic, urban background with a train passing by. Natural long hair, authentic happy vibe.

title: 1/6 Scale Figurine Portrait
prompt: Create a 1/6 scale commercialized figurine of the characters in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is the ZBrush modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

title: 1/7 Scale Figurine with Real Person
prompt: Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the character in the picture, realistic style, in a real environment. Figurine placed on a computer desk with a round transparent acrylic base. Next to the desk is the real person in the picture, life-sized, in the same attire as the figurine, cleaning the figurine carefully with a fine brush. Scene set in a modern styled studio room, brightly lit, with a collection of toys and action figures in the background.
